summary: Knock Them out of skyrim, but not really....
descriptionHtml:
Hello, i made this mod because i like the Homerun MOD thats in "DeadIsland Riptide".
this MOD allows you to send enemy's flying!.
I could not record this in action, due too my slow Pc and Internet(100kbs max),
But i do have pictures of a dark elf and a giant flying haha.
I made sure to add the effect to all WarHammers, so you can choose what one you like.
The chest is located in riverwood, by the saw mill.
the effect can send enemys flying but not too far, i tried to give it more force with magnitude,
but that did nothing, i would like someone to help me with this.
I used the "Unrelenting Force" Script to make this work, nothing is changed, just the items name,
Value, and description, I hope you like it as much as i do.
(See "Non-Flyable" for more info)
(the effect does not work if your hit kills them, idk why)

|------------LOCATION------------|
Riverwood (see Pictures for location)

|------------Features------------|
effect added to Every Warhammer in Skyrim/dawnguard/dragonborn.

|------------Non-Flyable------------|
Mammoths
Dragons
Horses.....

|------------Requirements------------|
Skyrim.
Dawnguard.
Dragonborn.

|------------Install------------|
Use Nexus Mod Manager

|------------Permission------------|
You have Permission to open my mod with the creation kit to see how i made this mod,
so you can apply the effect to what ever weapon you want, no need to credit me if you,
upload you mod, as i only copied and edited.

|------------Thanks------------|
Bethesda for Skyrim, Creation kit,
author: SkyMARIN
